title: Tom Holland | Trump Botches Social Media App; Classified Items Found at Mar-a-Lago: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at the latest news like Fox News and Republicans coming after Hillary Clinton and Trump flushing official White House records down the toilet.

Then, Tom Holland talks about his Marvel press tours, working with Toby Maguire and Andrew Garfield in Spider-Man: No Way Home and learning how to bartend for Uncharted.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
